altTitles.th: มนตร์รักอาณาจักรลับ

description.de:
Sera, eine gewöhnliche Büroangestellte, landet in der mysteriösen Welt eines primitiven Stammes. Ein unbekannter und sexy Tiermensch rettet sie vor der Bedrohung durch den primitiven Stamm. Nach einer Weile keimt eine unbekannte Fähigkeit in Seras Körper... Was wird ihr Schicksal sein?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Ridibooks (R15)](https://ridibooks.com/books/1746014650), [Ridibooks (R19)](https://ridibooks.com/books/1746014652)

**Official Translations:**
* English: [R15](https://manta.net/series/1257)
* Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语: [R15](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30095)
* French / Français: [R15](https://www.delitoon.com/webtoon/la-terre-du-totem), [R19](https://www.delitoon.com/webtoon/la-terre-du-totem-adulte)
* German / Deutsch: [R15](https://www.delitoon.de/detail/dad_2000181)
* Japanese / 日本語: [R15](https://piccoma.com/web/product/71873)
* Thai / ภาษาไทย: [R19](https://www.comico.in.th/titles/2618)
description.en:
Who's this mysterious Tarzan?

In a crazy turn of events, Sera, an office worker, is stranded on a remote island and captured by a native tribe. A mysterious Tarzan-esque man rescues her, but it turns out he's also on the run. As they flee the tribes that are after them, Sera develops a special power she can't quite understand.

She also feels attracted to the strange man...

---
Sera, an ordinary office worker ends up in the mysterious world of a primitive tribe. An unknown and sexy beastman rescues her from the threat of the primitive tribe.

After a while, an unknown ability germinates in Sera's body…

What will be her destiny?

(R19 version)

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Ridibooks (R15)](https://ridibooks.com/books/1746014650), [Ridibooks (R19)](https://ridibooks.com/books/1746014652)

description.id:
Sera, seorang pekerja kantoran biasa berakhir di dunia misterius suku primitif. Seorang beastman yang tidak dikenal dan seksi menyelamatkannya dari ancaman suku primitif. Setelah beberapa saat, kemampuan yang tidak diketahui tumbuh di tubuh Sera… Apa yang akan terjadi dengan takdirnya?

---
